h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: As you exit the cave, you'll find yourself at the bottom of a gorge with more plants to harvest as you proceed.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Wheel'.
The content is as follows:
As you exit the cave, you'll find yourself at the bottom of a gorge with more plants to harvest as you proceed.
